version_name: 2.3.1 presents… Reimagined Stories for Millennials. [iPhone only] The Three Little Pigs and The Wolf Who Did Some Really Clever Marketing- Boost your social media game with our new YOUR STORY design type! Best for Instagram Stories

version_description:
This update is full of “things you cannot see, but we promise you it’s there!” bug fixes and UI improvements. Designing on the app should go a little smoother, and crashes should be significantly reduced. :D

If something’s still being pesky on your end, let us know at http://canva.me/support. We’re always happy to see what you’re up to, so share your latest stuff with us on social. Happy designing from your friends at Canva! :-)

We’re all set and ready for iOS11! Here’s a rundown of the good stuff waiting for you in this update:
- [iOS11, iPhone only] Try out our NEW augmented reality Print preview! You get access to this feature when you share a printable template. It allows you to see your design placed on the nearest wall or table. Give it a whirl when you create a Business card, Card, Invitation, Flyer, or Poster!
- [iOS11, iPad only] Drag and drop feature is here! This means you’ll be able to freely add images from any source— making it easier than ever to customise an Instagram post, Twitter header, logo and more.

[other iPhone updates]
- We’ve revealed the search bar. This eliminates the extra step of swiping down to access it.
- Also, the text bug and a few other issues causing recent crashes have been triumphantly squashed.

If something’s still being pesky on your end, let us know at http://canva.me/support. Happy designing from your friends at Canva! :-)

This update follows Bob Ross’ painting philosophy: “There are no bugs or crashes, just happy little accidents.” We’ve fixed a crash related to saving designs to camera roll, squashed some bugs, and plugged leaks to make the app faster. ;)

In case you missed it— exciting iOS11 features from last update!
- [iPhone 6s & above only] Try out our Augmented Reality Print preview! Share your printable design to see it on the nearest wall or any flat surface.
- [iPad only] Drag and drop is here! Try this out when you’ve got Canva and another app open in Split View multitasking mode.

If something’s still being pesky on your end, let us know at http://canva.me/support. Happy designing from your friends at Canva! :-)

~* NEW STUFF for the iPhone in this version! *~
Crop Mode - bring focus to your images by resizing images with ease.

~* NOT NEW *~
Regular roundup of bug fixes and performance improvements for the editor.

~* NOT NEW — in case you haven't heard of our cool iOS11 Features *~
- [iPhone 6s & above only] Try out our Augmented Reality Print preview! Share your printable design to see it on the nearest wall or any flat surface.
- [iPad only] Drag and drop is here! Try this out when you’ve got Canva and another app open in Split View multitasking mode.

If something’s still being pesky on your end, let us know at http://canva.me/ios Happy designing from your friends at Canva! :-)

Lead investigator: Wait, go right. Up. Freeze that screen.
Tech guy: Zoom in on that spot?
LI: There's something on the car window. Can you clear that up?
TG: We can... ENHANCE!

In this update, we bestow you the power to play CSI!

NEW: Zoom feature!
• No need for a tech guy—just pinch your fingers out on the screen to hone in on the details of your design.
• Easily edit small elements and text to perfection with this game-changing update.

Upgraded: Multi-page view! Reviewing, adding, and designing pages should now feel as smooth as butter. Try this out by clicking on the lower-left corner icon while working on multi-page designs.

Fixed: disappearing photo filters and crashes caused by exporting multi-page designs. We got 'em, boys.

If something's still being pesky on your end, let our bug cops know at http://canva.me/ios. Happy designing from your friends at Canva! :-)

This update unlocks:
• A lot more templates for you to play with! No more disappearing elements as the app now supports all paid graphics.
• Improved experience with resizing elements, plus fixes for bugs and crashes.

In the last update, we unleashed the game-changer:
• NEW Pinch-to-zoom! Hone in on your design to easily edit small text and elements to pixel perfection.

If something's still being pesky on your end, let our bug cops know at http://canva.me/ios. Happy designing from your friends at Canva! :-)

Ready, set, swipe: our ~ NEW Multipage Editor ~ is here!
• Easily swipe through the pages of your design while in the middle of editing — great for quick changes or showing off your stuff, visual carousel-style.
• Adding a page now shows other relevant design templates.
• Improved animation and loading times—all in keeping a buttery-smooth multipage experience.
• Give this a try today! Explore and play with our Presentation or Business Card designs.

Other fixes in this update include reducing pinch-to-zoom delay and reported crashes.

If something's still being pesky on your end, share it with us at http://canva.me/ios. Happy designing from your friends at Canva!

[iPhone only]

Ready, set, swipe: Our ~ NEW Multipage Editor ~ is here!
• Easily swipe through the pages of your design while in the middle of editing — great for quick changes or showing off your stuff, visual carousel-style.
• Adding a page now shows other relevant design templates.
• Improved animation and loading times—all in keeping a buttery-smooth multipage experience.
• Give this a try with our Presentation or Business Card designs.

This update also includes fixes for crashes caused by undo's and paid illustrations.

If something's still being pesky on your end, share it with us at http://canva.me/ios. Happy holidays and happy designing from your friends at Canva!

[iPhone only]

Start 2018 with a clean slate—literally—with one of our most-requested features:

(desk drumroll) … Design from scratch with a blank template!

That’s right, if you’ve already got a layout in mind, why search for a matching template if you can DIY every detail? Try it now with an Instagram or Facebook Post.

Other goodies to support your creative resolutions for the year:
- Some of our templates like Presentation or Business cards have multiple page designs. You can now see this at a glance—look out for the page number labels on the bottom left corner of templates!
- We’ve made it easier to select single text or images in grouped elements. No need to separate them to edit the color or even delete stuff.
- In Zoom mode, element handles and lines are now easier to see and select.
- Also fixed crashes caused by changing of grouped elements’ layer order, and by sharing a design that hasn’t fully loaded yet.

If something's still being pesky, share it with us at http://canva.me/ios. Happy designing from your friends at Canva!

[iPhone only]

Significant Events of 2018 so far:
1. First monkey clones created in China
2. We launched one of our most-requested features: Blank templates!
3. Super Blue Blood Moon and...

4. NEW “Add a Logo” feature! [iPhone only]

Explore this power-up when you click on the “+” button in the editor. This will grant you the ability to:
- Boost your branding! Add logos to your designs (transparent PNG & JPG formats allowed!)
- Sidestep photo limitations—use as many images as you can fit on top of templates
- Canva desktop users: Access images you uploaded from your computer with the personal "Uploads" folder.

We’ve also fixed a small snap-grid bug, and made sure working with elements don’t slow your device down.

Get to decide the next big thing of 2018! Share your feature wishlists or bug stories at https://canva.me/ios. Happy designing from your friends at Canva!

Roses are red,
Violets have a tinge of blue.
It’s the month to be cheesy, so
We admit: life is gouda with you.

In this update [iPhone only]:
- Fixed: crashes caused by taking a photo after using Augmented Reality preview. Feel free to preview your printable designs any time!
- Also tweaked some tooltips for beginners using blank templates.

In case you missed our last few updates:
- NEW: Add a Logo feature! In the editor, tap on the “+” button, then select “Logos” to add your brand images to any design.
- NEW: Blank templates! Create your own unique layouts from scratch.

Send us love letters through https://canva.me/ios. Happy designing!

With a new season around the corner, we celebrate these newly-sprung updates:

[iPhone]
- NEW: for those using the app in languages other than English, we’ve spruced up the font download experience! You can now see the download progress and even cancel it.
- Fixed: crashing when adding background and text to a blank design. Feel free to fill up a blank template with as much graphics as you need.

- [iPad] NEW: Font Search bar! It’s now easier than ever to search, select, and compare font styles. Tap on a text you want to edit, then click on the font name (ex. “Helvetica”) to access the search bar.

- [Both] Text elements have been updated with new designs! To start playing with them:
(on iPhone) Tap the “ + “ in the editor, then select “Text.”
(on iPad) In the editor, tap on the “Text” icon on the sidebar.

What feature do you want to see from us this season? Let us know through https://canva.me/ios. Happy designing!

v2.7.8 updates — iPhone only:

• The app has been localized to the following: Afrikaans, Albanian, Armenian, Azerbaijan, Belarusian, Bulgarian, Croatian, Dutch (Belgium), English (Australia), Estonian, English (India), English (United Kingdom), French (Belgium), Georgian, Greek, Hungarian, Icelandic, Kazakh, Korean, Latvian, Lithuanian, Maltese, Moldovan, Mongolian, Montenegrin, Romanian, Serbian, Slovak, Slovenian, Ukrainian, Uzbek, and Vietnamese. Phew!

• We've also significantly improved how the app handles device memory, so expect reduced crashes. Huzzah!

v3.1.0 重磅升级，给你最想要的 -

iPad版本全面升级：享受跟iPhone端一样的编辑体验！现在你可以在大屏幕上体验强大的编辑功能了，新版本的首页和字体搜索焕然一新；

首页和搜索功能全面升级 - 解锁更多设计模板，改进后的搜索体验让你更快速的找到心仪模板；

设计尺寸支持自定义！点击搜索框旁的[•••]按钮即可输入定制化的长宽尺寸。你们最想要的功能我们工程师哥哥们安排上了；P

此外，我们还升级了文本编辑体验；提升了屏幕切换速度，让你更快速的完成设计。

喜欢我们为你准备的新功能么?欢迎你在https://canva.me/ios与我们分享你的想法或是告诉我们你想要的其他功能。设计快乐！

献给我亲爱的iPad用户：我们爱你，你们的声音我都听到了！我们正快马加鞭把横屏操作的功能加回来，操作变更引起的其他问题我们也正抓紧修复中。

V3.1.2更新功能：
• 现在你可以随心所欲的从本地图库添加多张图片进行编辑！在编辑界面点击“+”按钮后选择“图片“即可；
• 修复了图片添加滤镜后效果不被保存的问题；
• iPhone可添加图片作为自定义尺寸模板的背景图（P.S. 你没看错，Canva iPhone版现在支持模板自定义尺寸。点击搜索框旁的[•••]按钮即可输入定制化的长宽尺寸）；
• 修复了文字编辑时点击大小写所引起的卡顿问题。

各位小主对此次更新还满意么？欢迎你在https://canva.me/ios 与我们分享你的想法或是告诉我们你想要我们实现的功能。设计快乐！

重磅：视频功能已上线，所有模板上的图片都可替换成本地视频，或者直接上传视频啦，快来试试看~

• 已修复：现在可以正确裁剪翻转的图像。
• 已修复：设计中的文本在导出时不会改变大小。
• 我们还做了一些改进，使整体性能更快。
